pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generates HTML Tag Strings for HTML5 Elements Included in Mozilla's Documentation of HTML5 // Generates HTML tag strings for HTML5 elements included in Mozilla's documentation of HTML5. Attributes are passed as parameters. If the attribute name is a reserved R word, the attribute is suffixed with _attr (ex: for_attr). To declare a DOCTYPE, wrap html with function html_doc(). Mozilla's documentation for HTML5 is available here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en- US/docs/Web/HTML/Element. Elements marked as obsolete are not included.
